data.lyric:
[ti:Jingle Bell Rock]
[ar:Bobby Helms]
[al:Hollywood Christmas - The Best Christmas Songs from the 50’s & 60’s]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]Jingle Bell Rock - Bobby Helms
[00:01.46]Lyrics by：Joe Beal/Jim Boothe
[00:02.77]Composed by：Joe Beal/Jim Boothe
[00:03.91]
[00:08.12]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[00:11.34]
[00:11.99]Jingle bells swing and jingle bells ring
[00:15.86]Snowin' and blowin' up bushels of fun
[00:19.36]
[00:20.31]Now the jingle hop has begun
[00:23.33]
[00:23.90]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[00:27.29]
[00:27.88]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[00:31.31]
[00:31.82]Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
[00:35.41]
[00:35.93]In the frosty air
[00:39.25]What a bright time it's the right time
[00:43.33]To rock the night away
[00:47.09]Jingle bell time is a swell time
[00:51.01]
[00:51.77]To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh
[00:55.46]Giddyap jingle horse pick up your feet
[00:58.86]
[00:59.42]Jingle around the clock
[01:03.44]Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' feet
[01:06.76]
[01:07.62]That's the jingle bell rock
[01:10.18]
[01:11.41]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[01:14.74]
[01:15.39]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[01:19.36]Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
[01:22.87]
[01:23.82]In the frosty air
[01:26.80]What a bright time it's the right time
[01:31.31]To rock the night away
[01:34.81]Jingle bell time is a swell time
[01:39.03]
[01:39.63]To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh
[01:43.49]Giddyap jingle horse pick up your feet
[01:46.78]
[01:47.42]Jingle around the clock
[01:51.41]Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' feet
[01:54.84]
[01:55.72]That's the jingle bell
[01:57.81]That's the jingle bell
[01:59.75]That's the jingle bell rock
